name: Caster Arena (Demo)
description:
Caster Arena is a 1v1 spell casting game. Players choose their Heroes and Abilities, then battle in the arena.

Features:

 - 5 Playable Heroes

 - 45+ Playable Abilities

 - A full tutorial and some single-player challenges

 - Local-multiplayer support with both Constructing and Drafting modes

This is a Demo version of the game, many updates are on the way! 

Upcoming Features:

 - Many more Heroes

 - More single-player content

 - Instant replays

 - Online play with a ranked ladder, teams and more!
